main_001: Hi there, please wait one moment while the system starts up
main_002: Press start to begin scanning a new page, or press Y to access stored material
main_003: To start analysing the page press A
scanner_001: The page has been found, please hold steady
scanner_002: The page has been captured successfully
scanner_003: Try to bring the device closer to the page
scanner_004: Try to hold the device steady
extraction_001: Please wait while the extraction begins, this can take up to 2 mins
extraction_002: If you would like to study, the text, please press A
extraction_003: If you would like to study, the graph, please press X
extraction_004: If you would like to study, the equations, please press Y
extraction_005: If you would like to study, the tables, please press A
